entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 08:38 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then a few flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
